subject: Verify your domain for Vetchium Employer Portal
body_intro: Thank you for signing up for Vetchium Employer Portal! To verify your domain ownership, please add the following DNS TXT record.
body_dns_instructions: Add a TXT record to your DNS settings for {{.Domain}} with the values shown below.
body_expiry: This verification token will expire in {{.Hours}} hours.
body_ignore: If you didn't request this signup, please ignore this email.
footer: This is an automated message, please do not reply.
